ISSUE.TITLE: Filtering group list by Group type -> Show all groups does not show all groups
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY It actually shows all non-root groups (i.e. groups that have at least 1 parent: `parents__isnull=false`. I'd propose we get rid of this option: Since the default behavior of this list is to show all groups, this list is redundant.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #10662 from AlexSCorey/updatesProdDeps Updates Several UI Production Dependencies

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Remove all groups filter Remove all groups filter See: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/8593
